item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!
Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go hiking, snow shoeing, or cross country skiing on the trails at Benson’s Animal Park in Hudson NH. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way. This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout. I thought that we would enjoy nature for about two or three hours, with a few breaks/stops along the trail. This park is just full of beautiful views, so come and enjoy some fresh air, beautiful views, and all this while in good company of friends.
We will meet at 1:00 pm in the lot at the park entrance for Benson’s Animal Park in Hudson NH.
DIRECTIONS: Take Route 111 towards Salem, take a right on Kimball Rd, travel about ¼ mile to the park entrance on your right. Look for the meetup sign.
Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers so that you will be comfortable the whole time we are out on the trails.
If anyone cares to, we can then go grab a bite to eat or enjoy a hot chocolate, at a nearby restaurant.
This event is at no cost. I hope to see you there.

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

Location: Benson’s Animal Park, Kimball Hill Rd, Hudson, NH
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meetup sign.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Hiking, Snowshoeing or Cross Country Skiing at Benson's Animal Park, Hudson, NH
